array.name: df_appeal_doc_type_RG
array.item: Please take photos of the front and back side of your ID card (RG). Photos should be:

array.item: Please take a photo of your Reservista. Photo should:

array.item: Please take a photo of your Work and Social Security Card (CTPS). Photo should:

array.name: df_appeal_doc_type_passport
array.item: Please take a photo of your passport. Photo should:

array.name: df_appeal_driver_license_g1
array.item: Please upload a photo of your driver's license (CHN). Photo should be:
Clearly show all information, including your picture
Well-lit and not contain glare or reflections

array.name: df_appeal_driver_license_g2_qr
array.item: Upload a photo of the QR code on the back of your driver's license (CHN). Please ensure:
QR code is clear and not blurry
Photo is well-lit and doesn't have glare or reflections

array.name: df_appeal_self_photo
array.item: Take a clear photo gives waist up:
Please take off your glasses and/or hat
Photo must be clear, show your whole face, and not be a photo of another photo
Photo should be taken with good lighting
